Header.title: Sri Chintamani Trust
Header.paragraph:
॥ ॐ कृष्णाय वासुदेवाय हरये परमात्मने, 

 प्रणतः क्लेशनाशाय गोविंदाय नमो नमः ॥

About.paragraph:
Sri Chintamani Trust – A Divine Journey of Faith and Devotion

Welcome to Sri Chintamani Trust, a sacred initiative dedicated to preserving and promoting spirituality, tradition, and service. Rooted in deep devotion, our temple trust aims to create a spiritual sanctuary for devotees seeking divine blessings and inner peace.

Our trust is committed to maintaining and enhancing the glory of Mahadevi and Sakshi Ganesha Temple, fostering a divine atmosphere where devotees can offer prayers, participate in rituals, and immerse themselves in the sacred traditions of Sanatana Dharma. We conduct daily poojas, special festivals, annadanam (food donation), and various charitable activities to serve the community and uphold our rich cultural heritage.

Through this website, we provide updates on temple events, spiritual discourses, and ways for devotees to contribute to the temple’s growth and welfare. We welcome devotees to join us in our mission of spreading faith, devotion, and selfless service. Your participation and support help us sustain the sanctity of the temple and continue our philanthropic efforts.

May Sri Ganesha bless you with peace, prosperity, and spiritual fulfillment. Join us in this divine journey and stay connected with our sacred trust.

Visit us regularly for updates on temple activities and spiritual guidance. Ganpati Bappa Morya!
